column1: #text=I looked into my fridge and realized that I was out of food .
#text=I decided that despite the fact that it was raining outside , I was going to go to the super market to buy food .
#text=I drove my car to the nearest supermarket , which was about ten minutes away .
#text=Once inside I took a shopping cart because I knew I was going to stockpile food .
#text=I first went to get breakfast food .
#text=This included eggs , bacon , milk , cereal , cereal bars and fruit such as bananas and apples .
#text=Next I went to food I would usually eat for lunch .
#text=This included pasta , tomato sauce , mac and cheese , ramen , salad ingredients and perhaps some snacks .
#text=I also got a pound of Boar 's head turkey and bread .
#text=I then went to pick up a few slabs of steak , pork and chicken because I like to eat big dinners .
#text=Next , I went to the ice cream aisle and picked up my favorite rocky road ice cream for when I crave sweets .
#text=Overall it was a good experience , everything cost me about 120 but I got 10 percent off with my discount card .
